name: Requiem (KeizerZilla)
description:
INTRODUCTION

This is a rework for a game I made in May/2014. You can check the original on my profile page, the name is Speed Trail. I took all the reviews I had for the original one and worked hard to make a better game, but I'm sure there is a lot to improve yet. I hope you have a good time playing my game.

GAMEPLAY

Don't hit the walls or you will die and have to try the level again.

HOW TO PLAY

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move the ghost through the maze.

CREDITS

Code: KeizerZilla

Design: KeizerZilla and XHugoX

Audio: SFXR and Audacity

Music: Alexandr Zhelanov
